sentence.Network_en: But within days, the Luoyang Middle Court's discipline committee contacted her.
sentence.Network_cn: 但就在这几天里, 洛阳市中级人民人民法院的党的纪律检查委员会已经开始接触李法官惠娟女士了.

sentence.Network_en: Tianshu was not situated in Dingding Gate of Luoyang, but Duan Gate.
sentence.Network_cn: 天枢不是位于洛阳城定鼎门内, 而是在端门外.

sentence.Network_en: Lasting snow has swept Luoyang since the launch of Spring Festival transportation.
sentence.Network_cn: 春运启动以来,洛阳地区持续降雪.
